repairedDockerfile:
FROM debian:jessie 

RUN apt-get update && apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y \
git \
libxml2-dev \
libxslt-dev \
python-lxml \
python \
build-essential \
make \
gcc \
python-dev \
locales \
python-pip \
openssl \
libssl-dev \
python-twisted \
libffi-dev && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

ADD . /txcasproxy/ 

RUN cd txcasproxy && \
 pip install --no-cache-dir -r requirements.txt

WORKDIR /txcasproxy 

ENTRYPOINT ["/usr/bin/twistd"] 

CMD ["-n", "casproxy", "--help"]
